name: Granite 3 2B Instruct
description: IBM's 2B parameter foundation model finetuned for instruction following with multilingual support

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate contextually relevant text in multiple languages
examples: Write a blog post about artificial intelligence
Create content for a product launch in Spanish
Draft an email response to a customer inquiry

skills.name: Content Summarization
skills.description: Create concise summaries of longer texts
examples: Create a brief overview of this meeting transcript
Provide key points from this news article

skills.name: Question Answering
skills.description: Answer questions based on provided context or general knowledge
examples: What are the main causes of climate change?
Based on this document, what is the company's revenue target?

skills.name: Code-Related Tasks
skills.description: Generate and explain code for various programming tasks
examples: Write a Python function to calculate Fibonacci numbers
Create a SQL query to find the top customers by sales
